root.Summary: "Add to cart" button not responding to click on product page.
root.Author: Kovrigina N

Description.Steps_to_reproduce: <1>Find any product on the site</1> <2>Go on the page of a product</2> <3>Click on "add to cart" button</3>
Description.Actual_result: "Add to cart" button not responding to click.
Description.Expected: The product appears in the user's shopping cart
